__Job Description: WordPress Plugin Developer — WPRankLab \(AI Visibility Plugin, Similar to Yoast SEO\)__  
__Overview__  
We are looking for an experienced __WordPress plugin developer__ to build a new plugin called __WPRankLab__, an AI\-focused SEO tool designed to help website owners improve their visibility across AI search engines \(e\.g\., ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google Gemini, Claude, etc\.\)\.  
The plugin should function similarly to __Yoast SEO__ in UI/UX quality, feature structure, onboarding, and free\-vs\-paid limitations — but instead of optimizing for classic SEO, it will analyze and improve the site’s __AI visibility score__\.  
The plugin will have:

- A __Free version__, available on [WordPress\.org](http://wordpress.org/)
- A __Pro version__, activated via licensing \(with kill\-switch behavior\)
- A scheduled __weekly email report system__ modeled after the PromptWatch email format \(simple report for free users, full insights for paid users\)

__![:dart:](data:image/png;base64,) Goals of the Plugin__  
WPRankLab should:

1. Scan a website and compute an __AI Visibility Score__\.
2. Provide suggestions to improve ranking in AI search results\.
3. Send weekly emails summarizing the site's performance\.
4. Provide real\-time recommendations inside WordPress \(similar to Yoast’s colored SEO indicators\)\.
5. Allow users to upgrade to Pro directly within the plugin\.
6. Integrate with our existing __license server \+ kill switch__ \(similar to ActiveMemb\)\.

__![:key:](data:image/png;base64,) Key Features__  
__1\. AI Visibility Engine__  
The plugin should analyze:

- Content structure
- Schema markup
- Page readability
- AI model comprehension signals
- Presence of Q&A\-style content
- Entity clarity \(using NLP\)
- Clustering of topics
- Internal linking structure
- Missing topical coverage
- AI\-friendly metadata & summaries

Outputs should be displayed using colored indicators \(green/orange/red\), similar to Yoast’s scoring system\.

__2\. Free Version \(__[__WordPress\.org__](http://wordpress.org/)__\)__  
__Core Features__

- Basic AI visibility scan
- Single AI Visibility Score with an “up or down” arrow \(weekly\)
- Limited recommendations
- Limited Q&A enhancement suggestions
- Basic internal link suggestions
- Limited keyword/entity suggestions
- Weekly report email that only includes:
	- AI Visibility Score
	- Whether visibility went __up or down__
	- No detailed breakdown
- In\-dashboard prompts to upgrade to Pro
- Basic dashboard analytics \(past 4 weeks only\)

__Locked/Upgrade Features__  
Free users will see certain Pro features blurred/locked with “Upgrade to Pro to unlock\.”

__3\. Pro Version__  
__Full Feature Set__

- Full AI visibility analysis
- Deep content scoring \(per page & per post\)
- AI\-specific schema recommendations
- AI model comprehension enhancement engine
- Entity graph builder \(shows missing structured data\)
- Competitor AI\-visibility comparison \(via API\)
- Unlimited historical data
- Automatic “AI Summary” generator for each post
- Automatic “AI Q&A block” generator \(FAQ\-style content\)
- Advanced link analysis
- Weekly email with full insights \(similar to PromptWatch screenshot\), including:
	- Visibility Score
	- Citation Rank
	- AI visits
	- Crawler visits
	- Summary
	- Recommendations for next week

__Automation Features__

- Auto\-insert structured summaries
- Auto\-generate missing Q&A sections
- Auto internal linking suggestions
- Page audits for all posts \(batch mode\)

__4\. Licensing System \(Critical Requirement\)__  
The plugin must integrate with our existing license server, with behaviors identical to the ActiveMemb system:  
__Requirements__

- On activation, user enters license key
- Plugin validates with API endpoint
- Licenses include:
	- Status \(active, expired, invalid\)
	- Domain binding
	- Expiration date
	- Version allowed
- Daily cron check to validate license
- If license is invalid, missing, or expired:

__Kill\-Switch Behavior__

- ALL Pro functionality stops immediately
- Admin area shows a __large prominent notice__
- No Pro features, API calls, or UI elements should function
- Cannot hide notice via CSS \(intentionally persistent\)

__5\. Weekly Email Engine__  
__Runs via WP\-Cron__

- Detects user’s version \(free or pro\)

__Free Email Example__  
Subject: *Your Weekly AI Visibility Update — WPRankLab*  
Body:

- Visibility Score
- Arrow up/down
- Suggestion to upgrade for full insights

__Pro Email Example__  
Includes the detailed report as shown in the screenshot:

- Visibility Score
- Citation Rank
- AI visits
- Crawler visits
- Week summary and recommendations
- Charts \(optional but desirable\)
- “View Full Report” button linking to plugin report page

Emails should match the style of PromptWatch / AI Ranking Lab\.We can do the designs, we want the same as we have with the other plugins where it sends [make\.com](http://make.com/) request back home too, its just a webhook\.\(Attached is the image of what paid would see, we'd probably make this prettier\)

Also in that quote, I want a AI SEO checklist, so have like \.txt files etc so it can crawl it etc

And we can generate one

[https://chatgpt\.com/share/692ac912\-2e4c\-8003\-84e7\-65aceff9bed1](https://chatgpt.com/share/692ac912-2e4c-8003-84e7-65aceff9bed1)
